name: Howler Baboon
description: The Howler Baboon is a medium-sized beast characterized by its agility and strength. It thrives in packs, making it a fearsome opponent in combat.
memorable: Its Pack Tactics ability allows it to gain an advantage when fighting alongside allies.
goals: To hunt and defend territory in packs.
relations: Often found in groups or packs, can be related to other creatures in similar environments.
environment: Typically found in jungles or forested areas.
strengths: Very effective in close combat, especially when working together with allies.
weaknesses: Low intelligence makes it poorly suited for strategic planning.
attacks: Makes melee attacks with its fists and has the ability to throw rocks at a distance, both dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants it advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 13 for decent awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, allowing it to excel in physical challenges, and Perception for spotting threats.
additional_information: Average physical defenses with good durability.
Noted for its low social influence capabilities.
